lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know how to switch on and log onto a computer using their own password.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know how to save and open documents.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know how to interact with onscreen items through clicking; tapping; dragging; dropping; scrolling; and swiping.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Enter familiar words; using a physical or digital keyboard; into a word processor.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Identify; locate and use modifier keys on a physical or digital keyboard; for example by using Shift and Caps Lock.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know what a password is and describe why passwords are useful.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know how to report digital content; or activity; that makes them feel unsafe or uncomfortable.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that online content is presented on interconnected websites and pages.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know there are a range of devices that are all computers; including; personal computers; laptops; tablets and mobile telephones.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Identify the visible components of computing systems; including; computer; keyboard; mouse; screen; touch pad; headphones; speaker; camera and microphone.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Identify the tasks that devices are used for at home.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Use devices to take or record digitised media; including photography; audio and video.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Find; open; save and delete documents within a folder structure.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Recognise onscreen navigation symbols; including ←; →.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Begin to use menus to find and use the cut; copy and paste functions; and to open dropdowns.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Enter familiar words; using a physical or digital keyboard; into a word processor.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Change the appearance of text by exploring the available tools; for example by changing the colour; size and font type.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know a hyperlink connects websites and pages and can be linked to an icon; text or image.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that users can have many accounts and can choose what information to put into each one.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that there is a risk people online are not who they say they are.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that digital technology can give access to a wide variety of information.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that the internet is a network and that it has physical parts.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that technology can be used to communicate locally and globally.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Describe the difference between hardware and software.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Develop fluency and accuracy when typing in increasing quantity.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know what shortcuts are and be able to use shortcuts for cut; copy; paste; save; undo and re-do.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Identify and use spell-checking and proof-reading tools.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Identify common features of onscreen layouts and icons across a range of applications.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Add images to a document.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Compose; read; respond to and share online messages with specific individuals and with groups.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Use keywords to search for information in a search tool.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Navigate storage hierarchy appropriate to the device.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that their information is personal and identify the risks of sharing that information online.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Safely engage in online spaces; including in group chats; being aware that personal information and identifying photographs and/or videos should not be shared.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that device use can be monitored.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that people can be upset by things said to; or about; them.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that people create online content for a purpose; including advertising; expressing their opinions and sharing information.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that computers and their use has changed over time.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Develop fluency and accuracy when typing in increasing quantity.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know what shortcuts are and be able use shortcuts for cut; copy; paste; save; undo; re-do and help.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Use devices to create increasingly sophisticated digital artefacts; including the use of sound; video; text and other multimedia.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand how to create a folder structure and how to name folders and documents.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Insert and complete a table within a text document.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Edit; and organise; the layout of a document.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that web pages have addresses known as URLs; and know how to bookmark these.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know how to set secure and memorable passwords and understand why this is necessary.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that online content is stored and is hard to remove.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Treat others respectfully online and know that they should also be treated with respect.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that any images; videos; information or opinion shared online can be kept and shared further.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know the benefits and risks of online anonymity.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Recognise that online content may provide false information with the intent to deceive.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that digital communication enables online communities to exist.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that online communication has changed the way people interact.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that software requires specific hardware to operate.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Develop fluency and accuracy when typing in increasing quantity.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Use devices to create increasingly sophisticated digital artefacts; including the use of sound; video; text and other multimedia.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know ways to transfer files across devices.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Locate and use standard tools on a device; e.g. the calculator and calendar.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Edit images by changing colour; size and by cropping.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Use search functions within applications to find information.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand the need to set security and privacy settings to ensure that only content they want people to access is seen.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that what a user does online can have positive and negative consequences for themselves and for others; both online and offline.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand the risks of engaging with people online that they do not know.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that online content can be published and accessed instantly.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Recognise that cyberbullying takes place online and can take many forms.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Recognise the implications of overusing devices.

lessons.Learning Objective: Describe the benefits and risks of instant online communication.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Describe key benefits of computer use to society and individuals.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that some hardware and software can be incompatible with other hardware and software.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Develop fluency and accuracy when typing in increasing quantity.

lessons.Learning Objective: Use devices to create increasingly sophisticated digital artefacts; including the use of sound; video; text and other multimedia.

lessons.Learning Objective: Identify and use online and offline sources of help for using one or more applications.

lessons.Learning Objective: Insert hyperlinks into a document.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Create and edit a text document to meet a brief.

lessons.Learning Objective: Understand the importance of using a variety of different search strategies.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that any device connected to the internet is vulnerable to attack from malware.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Recognise that opinions expressed online can be misinterpreted by others.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that a digital footprint is a record of online activity; including the sharing of images; videos; information or opinions.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that any content shared online can be copied to other locations and used by other people.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that offensive and illegal online behaviour; which includes cyberbullying; should be reported and that there are formal procedures for this.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Describe ways to protect their safety and wellbeing before; during and after digital activity.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that restrictions apply to the copying of online content.

lessons.Learning Objective: Describe how the internet has changed the way in which people shop.

lessons.Learning Objective: Describe how online streaming has changed how people access media and entertainment.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand how digital technology can be disruptive.

lessons.Learning Objective: Develop fluency and accuracy when typing in increasing quantity.

lessons.Learning Objective: Use devices to create increasingly sophisticated digital artefacts; including the use of sound; video; text and other multimedia.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Know that files can be stored remotely on other computers; networks or in the cloud.

lessons.Learning Objective: Select and use online and offline tools that aid personal organisation and collaboration.

lessons.Learning Objective: Use track changes and comments when editing documents.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Use advanced search techniques to refine search results.

lessons.Learning Objective: Know some people purposefully antagonise other online users and understand the risks of engaging with that behaviour.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that they have personal responsibility for their digital activity; safety and wellbeing.

lessons.Subject: Digital Literacy
lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that all online activity can be collated and added to a user’s digital footprint; which can have positive and negative consequences.

lessons.Learning Objective: Describe the positives and negatives of online live coverage of news and events.

lessons.Learning Objective: Use devices to create increasingly sophisticated digital artefacts; including the use of sound; video; text and other multimedia.

lessons.Learning Objective: Create templates and master documents and understand the benefit of these.

lessons.Learning Objective: Use advanced search techniques to refine search results.

lessons.Learning Objective: Know that permissions can be set on files or within a network to protect them from unauthorised access.

lessons.Learning Objective: Understand personal identity can be protected by having a username which is not personally identifiable.

lessons.Learning Objective: Assess the suitability and security of websites and hyperlinks through reading the URL.

lessons.Learning Objective: Understand that metadata can be sold as a product.
